mapper.select: SELECT contact1_name, contact1_position, contact1_phone, contact1_mail, contact2_name, contact2_position, contact2_phone, contact2_mail FROM diyi_service_provider WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1} LIMIT 1
SELECT invoice_enterprise_name, invoice_tax_no, invoice_address_phone, invoice_bank_name_account FROM diyi_service_provider WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1} LIMIT 1

SELECT t1.id, t1.service_provider_name, t1.contact1_name, t1.contact1_phone, t1.service_provider_state, t1.create_time, (SELECT IF(paper_agreement_url IS NOT NULL AND paper_agreement_url <> '', paper_agreement_url, online_agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT' AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND service_provider_id = t1.id) AS join_contract FROM diyi_service_provider t1 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t1.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param1.serviceProviderName}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param1.beginDate}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(t1.create_time, #{param1.endDate}) <= 0

SELECT t1.id, t1.service_provider_name, t1.legal_person_name, t1.legal_person_idcard, t1.social_credit_no, t1.biz_licence_url, t1.service_provider_url, t1.contact1_name, t1.contact1_position, t1.contact1_phone, t1.contact1_mail, t1.contact2_name, t1.contact2_position, t1.contact2_phone, t1.contact2_mail, t1.invoice_enterprise_name, t1.invoice_tax_no, t1.invoice_address_phone, t1.invoice_bank_name_account, t2.employee_user_name, t2.phone_number, t2.worker_name, (SELECT IF(paper_agreement_url IS NOT NULL AND paper_agreement_url <> '', paper_agreement_url, online_agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT' AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND service_provider_id = t1.id) AS join_contract FROM diyi_service_provider t1 INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider_worker t2 ON t1.id = t2.service_provider_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.up_level_id IS NULL AND t1.id = #{param1}

SELECT t1.id, t1.service_provider_name, IF((SELECT COUNT(id) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT' AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND enterprise_id = t1.id) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_sign_contract FROM diyi_service_provider t1 WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND t1.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param1}, '%')

SELECT t1.id, t1.service_provider_name FROM diyi_service_provider t1
INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider t2 ON t1.id = t2.service_provider_id
WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0
AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.cooperate_status = 'COOPERATING' AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1}
AND t1.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param2}, '%')
